author: robbie
msg: QPID-5202: tweak wording to cover that CWNR feature doesn't need to be disabled for it to not close the connection

author: robbie
msg: QPID-5224: escape usage of the ExchangeBound AMQP extension during basic consumer setup to enable interop with 0-8/0-9/0-9-1 brokers that lack this Qpid extension to AMQP, such as RabbitMQ.

author: robbie
msg: QPID-5223: add system property to toggle populating the 'expiration' header with the raw TTL value instead of the actual expiration time, for interop with e.g. RabbitMQ

author: robbie
msg: NO-JIRA: publish trunk doc tweaks to site

author: sarowe
msg: LUCENE-5273: Fix slowdown when running 'ant example': unless called from the 'create-package' target, the 'lucene-jars-to-solr' and 'module-jars-to-solr' targets no longer depend on '-unpack-lucene-tgz', pulling lucene-*.jar from lucene/build/*/ instead. (merged trunk r1531750)
